A URL shortening extension is a tool that can be added to a web browser to quickly and easily shorten long website addresses. These extensions typically work by integrating with a URL shortening service, which assigns a unique identifier to the original URL and redirects users to the destination website when the shortened link is clicked.

By using a URL shortening extension, users can quickly generate and share shortened links without having to leave their web browser or navigate to a separate website. This can save time and increase efficiency, especially for those who frequently share links on social media, email, or instant messaging platforms.
